mapper.select: select d.doc_title as doc_title, doc_content, doc_date, doc_id, chapter_level, chapter_title, chapter_index, detail_content from doc d, chapter c where d.doc_title = c.doc_title
mapper.insert: insert into doc(doc_title, doc_content, doc_date, doc_id) values(#{docTitle}, #{docContent}, sysdate, doc_seq.nextval)
mapper.update: update doc set doc_content = #{docContent}, doc_date = sysdate where doc_title = #{docTitle}
mapper.select: select * from (select * from doc order by dbms_random.value) where rownum = 1
select doc_title from doc where doc_title like #{search}||'%'
